revised_title: The Effect of Sugar on Muscular Work and Fatigue
tldr: The author conducted experiments on themselves to determine the effect of sugar on muscular work and fatigue. They found that sugar, when taken as food, increases the amount of muscular work done and retards the onset of fatigue. The study suggests that sugar could be added to the daily diet of working individuals to improve their muscular power.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Nutrition and Metabolism
